dictionary.name: _code
dictionary.string: "uniform float saturation = 0.5;&#000a;vec3 luminanceWeighting = vec3(0.2125, 0.7154, 0.0721);&#000a;vec4 textureColor = tex(TEXTURE, UV);&#000a;float luminance = dot(textureColor.rgb, luminanceWeighting);&#000a;vec3 greyScaleColor = vec3(luminance);&#000a;COLOR = SRC_COLOR * vec4(mix(greyScaleColor, textureColor.rgb, saturation), textureColor.w);"
